title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both projects P1 and P2, the option to open or close the project is not consistently available.
EB: The open/close project option should consistently be available when selecting multiple projects, such as P1 and P2.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2.
2. Select P2.
3. Attempt to close the selected project.
4. Verify if the open/close project option is consistently available.
